# Natural Logarithm of 1/2

> [Natural logarithm][@stdlib/math/base/special/ln] of `1/2`.

<section class="usage">

## Usage

```javascript
var LN_HALF = require( '@stdlib/constants/math/float64-ln-half' );
```

#### LN_HALF

[Natural logarithm][@stdlib/math/base/special/ln] of `1/2`.

```javascript
var bool = ( LN_HALF === -0.6931471805599453 );
// returns true
```

</section>

<!-- /.usage -->

```javascript
var LN_HALF = require( '@stdlib/constants/math/float64-ln-half' );

console.log( LN_HALF );
// => -0.6931471805599453
```

</section>
